titleStmt.title: A narrative of a strange and sudden apparition of an arch-angel at the Old-Bayly, on Monday March the Seventh, 1680, English stile, betwixt the hours of three and five in the afternoon, to the great astonishment of the court and all that were present dedicated to all the ministers and church-wardens of the whole nation / by an eye-witness of the apparition.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, George, 1642-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
